name: Burst City
description:
A tiny prototype for an action roguelike kinda game.

Made in one month for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2020.

My first project using Unreal Engine.


Controls:

[AWSD] - Move character

[Left Mouse Button] - Attack

[Right Mouse Button] - Special Attack

[E] - Interact

[Escape] - Exit game

You can only use attack abilities when you move.

Used Assets:

"Animated Animales Low Poly" by quaternius (CC 0) https://opengameart.org/content/animated-animales-low-poly

"The Core (music) [futuristic]" by p0ss (CC-BY-3.0) https://opengameart.org/content/core-music-futuristic
